page.title: 12Employment
page.content: Whilst{unemployment}in this area is no worse than the national average the problem{persists. Employment}in this block is{divided between farming and {agricultural businesses}such as corn merchants, farm machinery repairs, chemical and other farm supplies. Others are employed within the block in small shops, joiners, plumbers, builders, garages, fuel merchants and plant hire. A large number of people have to leave the block for employment. A number work in business in Selby, Leeds, York and Goole.Others work for the public services and at the Power Stations.Some work in the flour mills of Selby and at the animal feed mills. A small number of people work outside the block in the mining industry.As the Selby mine develops more miners are coming into this block to live.
